notes: Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura from the same source do not stack. Fully stacks with other sources of Headdress-based items' health regeneration aura.
Fully stacks with other sources of Headdress-based items' health regeneration aura.
Can regenerate up to 120 health in one minute.
Does not affect wards, buildings and invulnerable units.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.

additionalInformation: With Regeneration Aura, the item grants a total of 2.5 health regeneration to the wielder.
name: Headdress
description: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
trivia: In DotA, Headdress was known as Headdress of Rejuvenation.
